page.title: 11SPORT IN CROY
page.content: Croy is not really a very sporting village,although once every year Croy Primary School holds a day of events,such as running,sack race,egg and spoon,and three legged races.The three teams are{red,blue,and {yellow}competing for a trophy.At the end everyone gets ice cream. There is also a small Croy Football Team,who practise every Thursday in the hope of getting a game against a nearby school,but because of bad weather and other reasons,they have not had a chance to show their skill. The Croy Youth Club is just starting up a hockey team for their members,and anyone else who is interested in this game,which is played with a club,and a small,flat object called a puck.
